abstract: Equatorial Guinea defeats Gabon, 2-0, and Republic of Congo beats Burkina Faso, 2-1, to reach quarterfinals of African Cup of Nations.
lead_paragraph: Host Equatorial Guinea advanced to the quarterfinals at the Africa Cup of Nations, and so did one of the big underdogs, the Republic of Congo.
snippet: Host Equatorial Guinea advanced to the quarterfinals at the Africa Cup of Nations, and so did one of the big underdogs, the Republic of Congo.
